settings.language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface
settings.profile.title: Profile Settings
settings.profile.description: Update your personal information and password
settings.password.title: Change Password
settings.password.fillAll: Please fill in all password fields
settings.password.tooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
settings.recording.title: Recording Settings
settings.recording.autoStopHelp: Automatically stop recording when limit is reached
settings.audioExtraction.title: Audio Extraction Settings
settings.audioExtraction.description: Configure how OpenTranscribe handles large video files. Audio extraction reduces upload size by 90%+ while preserving transcription quality.
settings.audioExtraction.enableExtractio: Automatically detect large video files and offer audio extraction
settings.audioExtraction.thresholdHint: Minimum video size to trigger extraction prompt
settings.audioExtraction.thresholdInfo: Videos larger than {{size}}MB will prompt for audio extraction
settings.audioExtraction.showDialogDesc: Ask before extracting audio (disable to extract automatically)
settings.audioExtraction.rememberChoiceD: Remember your last extraction decision (extract vs. upload full video)
settings.audioExtraction.saveFailed: Failed to save audio extraction settings
settings.audioExtraction.loadFailed: Failed to load audio extraction settings. Using defaults.
settings.audioExtraction.howItWorks1: Large video files are automatically detected during upload
settings.audioExtraction.howItWorks2: Audio is extracted client-side using your browser (nothing sent to server until complete)
settings.audioExtraction.howItWorks3: Original video metadata is preserved for accurate transcription
settings.audioExtraction.howItWorks5: Format: Opus @ 32kbps, 16kHz mono (optimal for Whisper ASR)
settings.transcription.title: Transcription Settings
settings.transcription.description: Configure transcription quality, speaker diarization, and garbage segment cleanup preferences.
settings.transcription.speakerDetectionD: Configure speaker diarization behavior for transcriptions.
settings.transcription.speakerDetectionT: Configure how many speakers the diarization model should detect. PyAnnote uses clustering with no hard upper limit - values up to 50+ are supported for large events.
settings.transcription.behaviorTooltipAl: Show speaker settings dialog on every upload or reprocess.
settings.transcription.behaviorTooltipUs: Skip the dialog and automatically use system-wide defaults
Skip the dialog and use your custom min/max values saved below.
settings.transcription.garbageCleanupDes: Replace long noise artifacts with [background noise].
settings.transcription.garbageCleanupToo: WhisperX can sometimes misinterpret background noise (fans, static, rumbling) as extremely long "words" with no spaces. This feature detects and replaces these artifacts with [background noise].
settings.transcription.languageSettingsD: Configure language preferences for transcription and AI analysis.
settings.transcription.languageSettingsT: Configure language options for transcription and AI summaries. Source language helps improve transcription accuracy. Translation converts foreign audio to English text.
settings.transcription.sourceLanguageToo: Let Whisper automatically identify the spoken language.
Provide a hint to improve accuracy when you know the audio language.
Languages with word-level timestamps are marked with a checkmark.
settings.transcription.translateToEnglis: When enabled, foreign language audio will be transcribed and translated to English. When disabled, the transcription stays in the original language.
settings.transcription.aiSummaryLanguage: Choose the language for AI-generated summaries, action items, and analysis. This setting is independent of the transcription language - you can transcribe in Spanish but get summaries in English, or vice versa.
Language used for AI summaries and analysis
settings.transcription.defaultsValue: Source: Auto-detect, Translate: Off, Summary: English
settings.transcription.validationMinMax: Minimum speakers cannot be greater than maximum speakers
settings.transcription.validationMinRang: Minimum speakers must be between 1 and 50
settings.transcription.validationMaxRang: Maximum speakers must be between 1 and 50
settings.transcription.validationThresho: Garbage cleanup threshold must be between 20 and 200
settings.transcription.loadFailed: Failed to load transcription settings. Using defaults.
settings.garbageCleanup.title: Garbage Word Cleanup
settings.garbageCleanup.desc: Replace long noise artifacts with [background noise].
settings.garbageCleanup.tooltip: WhisperX can sometimes misinterpret background noise (fans, static, rumbling) as extremely long "words" with no spaces. This feature detects and replaces these artifacts.
settings.garbageCleanup.saveFailed: Failed to save garbage cleanup configuration
settings.garbageCleanup.loadFailed: Failed to load garbage cleanup configuration
settings.retry.title: Failed Task Retries
settings.retry.desc: Automatically retry failed transcriptions before marking as failed.
settings.retry.tooltip: When a transcription fails due to temporary issues (GPU memory, network), the system can automatically retry. Limiting retries prevents infinite loops for permanently failing tasks.
settings.aiPrompts.title: AI Summarization Prompts
settings.aiPrompts.description: Manage your AI summarization prompts to customize how transcripts are analyzed and summarized.
settings.aiPrompts.systemPromptTooltip: This system prompt cannot be deleted or edited. Create custom prompts to suit your specific needs.
settings.aiPrompts.noCustomPromptsDesc: Create your first custom prompt to personalize your AI summarization experience.
settings.aiPrompts.descriptionPlaceholde: Brief description of this prompt's purpose
settings.aiPrompts.promptTextPlaceholder: Enter your custom prompt text here. Use {transcript} and {speaker_data} placeholders where needed.
settings.aiPrompts.promptTextHelp: Use {transcript} and {speaker_data} as placeholders for the actual transcript and speaker information.
settings.aiPrompts.llmTipText: Consider using any LLM to help craft effective prompts for your needs.
settings.aiPrompts.nameAndTextRequired: Name and prompt text are required
settings.aiPrompts.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the prompt "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
settings.aiPrompts.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes that will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue without saving?
prompts.systemPromptTooltip: This system prompt cannot be deleted or edited. Create custom prompts to suit your specific needs.
prompts.noCustomPromptsDesc: Create your first custom prompt to personalize your AI summarization experience.
prompts.nameAndTextRequired: Name and prompt text are required
prompts.promptDeletedWithFallback: Prompt deleted successfully. {{name}} is now active and will be used for all future summaries.
prompts.promptDeletedDefaultActive: Prompt deleted successfully. Default system prompt is now active.

prompts.promptTextPlaceholder: Enter your custom prompt text here. Use {transcript} and {speaker_data} placeholders where needed.

settings.llmProvider.title: LLM Provider Configuration
settings.llmProvider.description: Configure your preferred Large Language Model provider for AI summarization and speaker identification.
settings.llmProvider.deleteAllTooltip: Delete all saved configurations (LLM features will be disabled)
settings.llmProvider.noConfigsDesc: Create your first LLM configuration to enable AI summarization and speaker identification.
settings.llmProvider.deleteConfigConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the configuration "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
settings.llmProvider.deleteAllConfirmMes: Are you sure you want to delete all LLM configurations? This will disable AI features (summarization and speaker identification) until you create a new configuration. This action cannot be undone.

notifications.title: Notifications
about.title: About OpenTranscribe
about.subtitle: AI-Powered Transcription & Media Management Platform
about.description: OpenTranscribe transforms your audio and video files into accurate, searchable transcripts using cutting-edge AI models. Built for professional workflows with an intuitive user experience.
about.aiTranscriptionDesc: WhisperX for highly accurate speech-to-text with word-level alignment.
about.speakerDetectionDesc: PyAnnote automatically identifies different speakers in conversations.
about.fullTextSearchDesc: OpenSearch integration enables powerful searching across all transcripts.
about.llmSummariesDesc: Generate intelligent summaries and extract action items with AI.
about.progressiveWebAppDesc: Works seamlessly across desktop and mobile devices.
about.securePrivateDesc: Self-hosted with role-based access control and JWT authentication.
about.stepUploadDesc: Upload audio/video files or record directly in the browser.
about.stepProcessDesc: AI models transcribe speech and identify speakers automatically.
about.stepEnhanceDesc: Generate summaries, extract action items with LLM features.
about.stepExploreDesc: Search, filter, and manage transcripts with powerful tools.
about.builtWithIntro: OpenTranscribe is powered by these amazing open-source technologies:
about.gratefulMessage: We're grateful to the open-source community for making OpenTranscribe possible.
about.whisperFoundation: provides the foundation for our transcription capabilities.
about.version: OpenTranscribe v2.0 - Built for professional transcription workflows

uploader.mediaUrlDescription: Enter a video URL to download and transcribe. YouTube is the primary recommended platform. Other platforms may work but are not guaranteed.
uploader.supportedPlatformsList: YouTube (recommended), Dailymotion, Twitter/X, Vimeo (public only), and 1800+ more sites via yt-dlp
uploader.platformAuthRequired: This video requires authentication and cannot be downloaded
uploader.platformLimitations: Authentication is not currently supported for most platforms. Password-protected corporate video portals may require additional credentials.
